title: Carla Hall
itunes:title: Carla Hall
itunes:subtitle: Carla Hall [Top Chef, Crazy Delicious, The Chew, Cooking with Love] talks with Anna about the difference between Soul food and southern food, being tall, being loud, the job of being happy, jealousy, puzzle technique, meeting her husband on Match.com, a n
description:
Carla Hall [Top Chef, Crazy Delicious, The Chew, Cooking with Love] talks with Anna about the difference between Soul food and southern food, being tall, being loud, the job of being happy, jealousy, puzzle technique, meeting her husband on Match.com, a new approach to celery and more. Later in the episode Anna and April Beyer talk with a listener who keeps meeting partners who are still attached to their exes.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting  www.levelconnections.com

Order Dealbreakers now. On sale May 11 wherever books are sold
